name: We Live Along Lattitudes Precisely Unknown
description:
I'm in love with yellows and gray lately. This amber hue in the yellow family is a bit richer and perhaps more serious than a bright yellow. This plays nicely with the more fanciful circular markings of the painting. Looking very closely one can see tiny remnants of nearly fluorescent orange, peach and blue peeking out from behind the final toned down layers of the piece. This gives the viewer plenty of opportunity to stay with the piece, discovering all the many subtle nuances.

DETAILS: 24x24 inches, 4-inch deep canvas, gallery wrapped with finished painted edge for contemporary sculptural look. Acrylic, graphite and charcoal on canvas.

name: Tide Pool
description:
This sea inspired piece can be hung vertically or horizontally. The teals and greens and blues wash over one another while lines carved into the surface of the painting create designs reminiscent of waves or the shapes of shells and coral. Subtle lettering is barely visible. Words say EBB FLOW - a nod toward the tide pool and also to the rhythm of our lives.

DETAILS: 36x40inches, Acrylic, venetian plaster, charcoal, ink and graphite on canvas, simple wood strip frame. May be hung vertically or horizontally.

name: Two As One
description:
This organic inspired abstract painting was inspired by a particular field I enjoy walking through in the early morning and again at dusk.  It's composition and warm color palette are complimented by the highly textured paint giving a "real feel" of the grasses. The painting has a beautiful satin varnish over the top of it and glows beautifully where well lit. Multiple focal points in texture can be discovered when viewed close up. This elegant painting makes a warm, natural statement in a clean modern style.

DETAILS: 36x36 inches (3x3 feet), acrylic on canvas. The canvas is 2 inches deep and gallery wrapped for a contemporary frame free display. 

IMPORTANT NOTE:  
SHIPPING will be determined based on your delivery location and time preferences, and will be invoiced separately.

name: Kisses in Venice
description:
An organic abstract original painting. I was inspired by leaves and pebbles and berries perhaps falling from the trees, lying on the ground or floating in water. The image speaks of nature yet in a contemporary, slightly abstracted style. 

Acrylics, graphite, ink, and charcoal on canvas. Painting measures 40x30 inches. Canvas is two inches deep and gallery wrapped with finished edges for modern frame-free display.

name: Wash of Rain - SOLD
description:
This organic inspired abstract painting not only hints at nature through it's composition and warm color palette, but also includes actual organic material - native Texas switchgrass - in particular focal points of the painting. Reds, magentas, oranges and yellows seem to seep out from these built up areas, like the stain of flower petals or herbs drenched in a summer rain. The painting has a beautiful satin varnish over the top of it and glows beautifully where well lit. This elegant painting makes a gentle statement in a big way.

DETAILS: 48x48 inches (4x4 feet), oil (with acrylic underpainting) and organic materials on canvas. The canvas is 2 inches deep and gallery wrapped for a contemporary frame free display. 

IMPORTANT NOTE:  
SHIPPING will be determined based on your delivery location and time preferences, and will be invoiced separately.

name: Love Notes - SOLD
description:
A subtle take on an abstract notion of love notes. Some of the areas look like flower petals that have been rained on with their pigment leaving an impression in their wake. Other areas contain scribble marks signifying language. I love the idea of a story about two lovers that no one else but them can read.

This original painting is 24x48 inches, acrylics and charcoal on canvas. The 2 inch deep gallery wrapped canvas has a painted edge and requires no framing. Although you can always take it to your favorite framer if you wish.

name: Prickly Pear
description:
The painting is 24x24 inches, acrylics and graphite on canvas. The canvas is "gallery wrapped" (staples on back) and requires no framing. It is 3 inches deep and creates a wonderful, almost sculptural feel because of this depth.

The painting comes ready to hang, signed on front and back by the artist.

name: Portofino Sun - SOLD
description: 30x24 inches, acrylics on canvas. Bold, sun inspired colors and deep textures. Canvas is 2 inches deep and gallery wrapped for contemporary frame free display.

name: Aqueduct - SOLD
description:
This contemporary, abstract painting is highly textured and full of interesting layers that peek through and beg to be examined. It's hazy, water-like color palette and simply composed design give this modern piece a sense of elegance. It would fit well in traditional, eclectic and modern interiors.

Details: 60x48 inches, acrylics, venetian plaster, and oil on canvas. The canvas is 2 inches deep and gallery wrapped for a contemporary frame free display. 

***IMPORTANT NOTE***
Due to the size of this piece, please contact me for a proper shipping quote to your zip code. Thank you.

name: Relativity - SOLD
description: 24x24 inches, acrylics on canvas with sculptural metal embellishments. Bold, water inspired colors and deep textures and red undertones. Canvas is 2 inches deep and gallery wrapped for contemporary frame free display. I LOVE this piece!

name: Balancing Act - SOLD
description: 24x24 inches, acrylics on canvas with sculptural metal embellishments. Bold, sun inspired colors and deep textures. Canvas is 2 inches deep and gallery wrapped for contemporary frame free display. I LOVE this piece!

name: Line of Inquiry
description:
Soothing grey tones lend a modern touch to this piece of organic abstract work. Inspired by a nature's horizons and lines created in the sand by swaying palm fronds or the footstep patterns left by the Kingfisher birds as they dodge the waves, running in search of food. These natural designs are beautiful and lyrical, like a dance. One only has to look for them and remain aware of all the simple treasures that are underfoot.

DETAILS: 12x24 inches, simple wood strip frame, 2 inches depth, acrylic, venetian plaster and charcoal on canvas.

name: Lyrics
description:
Soothing grey tones lend a modern touch to this piece of organic abstract work. Inspired by a nature's horizons and lines created in the sand by swaying palm fronds or the footstep patterns left by the Kingfisher birds as they dodge the waves, running in search of food. These natural designs are beautiful and lyrical, like a dance. One only has to look for them and remain aware of all the simple treasures that are underfoot.

DETAILS: 20x30 inches, simple wood strip frame, 2 inches depth, acrylic, venetian plaster and charcoal on canvas.

name: Origin
description:
Color and texture hold the key in the painting. The yellow areas are painted in a rich acrylic paint with a satin finish, while the white areas are painted in fresco style with matte finish venetian plaster. Multiple raised areas of the design give the piece movement and body to a composition that is clean and ordered. A popular piece in recent exhibits. An abstract work, yet always with a nod toward our natural world.

DETAILS: 24x24 inches, Acrylics and venetian plaster on canvas, 2-inch deep finished edge for contemporary frame-free hanging.

name: Under the Glowing Gold
description:
The painting is 24x30 inches, acrylics, ink, conte pencil, charcoal and graphite on canvas. The canvas is "gallery wrapped" (staples on back) and requires no framing. It is 4 inches deep and creates a wonderful, almost sculptural feel because of this depth.

The painting comes ready to hang, signed on front and back by the artist.

name: Night Rain - SOLD
description:
(click on images to view larger)

Night Rain is a wonderfully textured work of acrylics and oils on canvas. The impasto application of paint enhances the feel of rain falling on the waves below. 

The surface has a soft, satiny glow to it with random places open to reveal the colors and textures in previous layers of paint. While the color palette is full of deep greens and blues, the final layer of oil paint allows light to reflect off of it and the absolute richness of these hues become evident. A quiet, powerful and atmospheric painting, this piece looks beautiful in all types of interior settings.

24x36 inches, acrylic and oil on 2-inch deep gallery wrapped canvas.
